anime.description: * Based on a picture book by http://anidb.net/cr55752 [326 (Nakamura Mitsuru)]. Foo, a kind boy, lives together with his grandmother. However, Foo has no friends. One day, as Foo is off picking herbs on a mountain to treat his grandmother`s illness, he finds himself lost. But then he is saved by a boy demon with bright-red skin named Smoochy. The two kind yet friendless boys meet and become each other`s first friend. The two begin to spend their days playing together, until one day Foo suddenly stops coming to the mountain. And then...
